price: 22. « Allez vite à votre champ si vous comptez (toujours) en achever la récolte. »
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
